item.title: Void Linux w/ encrypted boot, rootfs and swap on BIOS
item.author: Author
item.description: So today, we will see how to properly set up an uncomplicated Void Linux full disk encryption installation on legacy BIOS. First things first In case you’re wondering : 1. Why Void Linux ? I’ve recently acquired an old laptop, so what’s better for this old boi than an ultra lightweight systemd free GNU/Linux distribution ? 2. Why encrypted ? It’s a (bad ?) habit I got from work.
